        ["Left Leg"] = CFrame.new(0.00000,0.00000,0.00000, 1.00000,0.00000,0.00000, 0.00000,1.00000,0.00000, 0.00000,0.00000,1.00000),
        ["Right Arm"] = CFrame.new(0.00000,0.00000,0.00000, 1.00000,0.00000,0.00000, 0.00000,1.00000,0.00000, 0.00000,0.00000,1.00000),
        ["Left Arm"] = CFrame.new(0.00000,0.00000,0.00000, 1.00000,0.00000,0.00000, 0.00000,1.00000,0.00000, 0.00000,0.00000,1.00000),
        ["Right Leg"] = CFrame.new(0.00000,0.00000,0.00000, 1.00000,0.00000,0.00000, 0.00000,1.00000,0.00000, 0.00000,0.00000,1.00000),
        ["Head"] = CFrame.new(0.00000,0.00000,0.00000, 1.00000,0.00000,0.00000, 0.00000,1.00000,0.00000, 0.00000,0.00000,1.00000),
    } },
}

-- store your original C0s just like before
local char = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character or game.Players.LocalPlayer.CharacterAdded:Wait()
local torso = char:WaitForChild("Torso")
local joints = {
    ["Right Arm"] = torso:WaitForChild("Right Shoulder"),
    ["Left Arm"]  = torso:WaitForChild("Left Shoulder"),
    ["Right Leg"] = torso:WaitForChild("Right Hip"),
    ["Left Leg"]  = torso:WaitForChild("Left Hip"),
    ["Head"]      = torso:WaitForChild("Neck"),
}
local originalC0s = {}
for name, joint in pairs(joints) do
    originalC0s[name] = joint.C0
end

-- playback function
local function playAnimation()
    local start    = tick()
    local total    = keyframes[#keyframes].time
    local idx      = 1

    RunService:BindToRenderStep("GeneratedAnim", Enum.RenderPriority.Character.Value+1, function()
        local now = tick() - start
        if now >= total then
            for name, j in pairs(joints) do
                j.C0 = originalC0s[name]
            end
            RunService:UnbindFromRenderStep("GeneratedAnim")
            return
        end
        while idx < #keyframes and keyframes[idx+1].time <= now do
            idx = idx + 1
        end
        for name, cf in pairs(keyframes[idx].offsets) do
            joints[name].C0 = originalC0s[name] * cf
        end
    end)
end

-- auto‑play on script run
playAnimation()
